value.string: This bot coordinates and runs the Child bots as per the business.
0. Author, Description and Change History Section
2. Calling "ExcelUtility" bot to fetch the table schema.
3. Calling 'PrepareSearchParameter' bot to get all the search parameters in form of a data table.
4. Calling 'EssplDatabase' bot to get all the existing searched candidates from the DB.
5. Calling 'JobPortalLogin' bot to login into the portal
6.1 Calling 'EssplDatabase' bot to get max sl no for the candidate list from DB
6.2 Calling 'SearchCandidateInPortal' bot to search in the portal
6.3 Calling 'ExtractCandidateInfoFromPortal' bot to extract data from the portal as per the search criteria.

value.expression: No candidates found for the "Job Request Number" : $strJobRequestNumber$ in the Job Portal.

value.string: 6.4 Calling 'ExcelUtility' bot to save the extracted information from portal into the excel sheet
6.5 Calling 'EssplDatabase' bot to save the extracted information from Portal to the DB.
6.6 Calling "ExcelUtility" Bot to Update Status in Open Tracker sheet
6. Loop through each search parameter to search the records and move ahead
7. Logout from Job Portal and close browser tab

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

window.name: Facebook – log in or sign up - Google Chrome

variables.name: isSuccess
variables.description: Returns the status of the Bot, True for Success or Failse for Failed

defaultValue.string: SELECT ISNULL(A.max_slno,0)+1 AS max_slno FROM (SELECT MAX(CAST(SlNo AS INT)) AS max_slno FROM [dbo].[HR_tblCandidateInfo]) A

SELECT (name + YearOfExp + CTC + CurrentLocation) AS ID FROM [dbo].[HR_tblCandidateInfo]
WHERE DATEADD(MONTH, <PERIOD>, CONVERT(datetime, [InfoCollectedOn], 120)) >= GETDATE()
